ingredients: 1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust, 2  pears - peeled, cored and cut in half, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 cup butter,   +   1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 2  eggs, beaten
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 19%, Saturated Fat 6g 30%, Cholesterol 62mg 21%, Sodium 176mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 47g 17%, Dietary Fiber 3g 9%, Total Sugars 31g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 2mg 11%, Calcium 16mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 102mg 2%
